channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘Pollyanna Principle’ Of True Happiness, Explained By A Psychologist
item.description: Focusing on your happiness might seem self-serving, but research explains how it could be the key to making a real-world impact. Here's how the Pollya...

item.title: ‘Slow Horses’ Gets A Terrific Season 5 Trailer Ahead Of Premiere
item.description: The gang is at it again in this exciting Slow Horses Season 5 trailer.

item.title: ‘Superman’ Sequel ‘Man Of Tomorrow’ Gets A Surprising Release Date
item.description: Superman returns much sooner than expected.

item.title: All ‘Conjuring’ Universe Films Ranked Worst To Best By Rotten Tomatoes

item.title: Google Stock Up After Judge’s Muted Penalty. No Need To Buy $GOOG
item.description: Google's stock ticked up after a judge decided on a milder-than-expected punishment for violating an antitrust law.

item.title: The hustle loop
